## setBody() function

Creates a new response with a new body

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function setBody<B1, B2>(resObject: ResponseObject<B1>, body: B2): ResponseObject<B2>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  resObject | <code>ResponseObject&lt;B1&gt;</code> | The response to set the body on |
|  body | <code>B2</code> | Body to be set |

<b>Returns:</b>

`ResponseObject<B2>`

New response with the new body
